dcterms:creator: Keith Ito
dcterms:description: The LJ speech dataset consists of 13,100 short audio clips of a single speaker reading passages from 7 non-fiction books, totaling roughly 24 hours of speech data recorded in a home environment.
dcterms:title: LJ speech data

dcterms:creator: Daniel Griffin
Jae Lim
dcterms:description: The Griffin-Lim algorithm is a method for estimating missing phase information from a spectrogram by iteratively converting between frequency and time domains.
dcterms:title: Griffin-Lim algorithm

dcterms:creator: Ryuichi Yamamoto
dcterms:description: The WaveNet implementation is a vocoder that uses a neural network to synthesize audio from mel-spectrograms, providing high-quality audio synthesis.
dcterms:title: WaveNet implementation
